name: Codename: Art Attack
description:
CGFX 2020 Game Jam Submission. We chose the theme "Heist" and "Connection". 

To complete these themes our game takes on the Co-Op mechanic, One thief, one Gunman.  The gunman remains static in the centre of the map and must protect the unarmed thief from waves of FBI that are trying to stop the  thief from stealing more and more artefacts.  

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Thief Movement

Mouse and Left Mouse Click = Gunman Aim and Fire 

E = Collect Artefact (Glowing objects in Cases around the map)
